description: Small moves priced as a minimum crew-hour block plus estimated additional hours.
questions: Is this within ABQ city limits or longer distance?
What is being moved (number of rooms / large items)?
Are there stairs, elevators, or difficult access at either location?
Do you need packing help or just load/drive/unload?
operator_guidance: Start with a 2-mover, 2-hour minimum for standard small moves within ABQ.
Increase estimated hours for stairs, long walks, or heavy/bulky items.
Consider a 3rd mover or longer minimum for jobs with many stairs or long carrying distances.
Quote a single estimated total; do not present per-mover math to the client.
